name: Highland Clearances (Kristofer Stevenson)
description:
Highland Clearances is a short prototype for Windows.

Don't touch the sheep, avoid the red coats, and escape to the coast.

The Highland Clearances prototype was developed by:

Kristofer Stevenson: Lead Gameplay and UI Programmer, Scripted Sequence Designer, Level Design

jkelly: Game Design, Additional Programming, 3D Modelling, Build Engineer

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 200 MB free space

RAM: 4 GB

VRAM: 2 GB
